mapper.select: SELECT #{p_ship_kind} AS SHIP_KIND , #{vDwgNo} AS DWG_NO , (SELECT SDCM.DESCRIPTION FROM STX_DWG_CATEGORY_MASTERS@stxerp SDCM WHERE SDCM.DWG_NO_CONCAT = SUBSTR(#{vDwgNo},1,5)) AS DWG_NAME , #{vItemCode} AS ITEM_CODE , (SELECT ITEM_DESC FROM STX_TBC_ITEM@stxerp WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{vItemCode}) AS ITEM_DESC , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS IS_EXT_DB_MASTER FROM STX_EMS_DB_MASTER@stxerp SEDM , STX_EMS_SHIP@stxerp SES WHERE SEDM.ITEM_CODE = SES.ITEM_CODE AND SEDM.ITEM_CODE = #{vItemCode} AND SES.SHIP_SIZE || SES.SHIP_TYPE = #{p_ship_kind}) AS IS_EXT_DB_MASTER , #{vEa} AS IN_EA FROM DUAL
